column3: Back then it was an alias for BASE_ROOT_DIR (the root of the git folder) and removed because it was redundant.

> Also fixes #18768

Is [this message](https://travis-ci.org/github/hebasto/bitcoin/jobs/679743620#L3321) expected:
```
it looks like wine32 is missing, you should install it.
multiarch needs to be enabled first.  as root, please
execute "dpkg --add-architecture i386 && apt-get update &&
apt-get install wine32"
```
no idea. This was removed in 59e9688eda4c4b01ee1713625632cd766c1a7ca9\n\nSeems unrelated to this pull.
It is absolutely unrelated, but would you mind adding a typo fix in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/fa6630d11a5a30f73e2e76d0804f518b9cba094d/ci/test/00_setup_env.sh#L62 s/`:`/`:-`/ ?

The "typo fix" doesn't pass, so I went ahead and reverted it. https://cirrus-ci.com/task/4815052404424704?command=ci#L20\n\nI don't understand bash well enough to debug this, but this might be related: https://wiki.bash-hackers.org/syntax/pe#use_a_default_value
